name: Nightmare Halls
storyline:
Welcome to Nightmare Halls, a chilling first-person horror adventure where your wits—and your courage—will be put to the test. Trapped within the shadowy corridors of an ancient, forsaken mansion, you awaken with no memory of how you arrived. The air is thick with dread, the walls whisper secrets, and every creak of the floorboards sends your heart racing.

This isn’t just a game—it’s a descent into terror. To escape the mansion’s sinister grip, you’ll need to unravel its dark history by solving puzzles, deciphering clues, and uncovering hidden passages. But beware: the mansion is alive with horrors—unseen entities, grotesque apparitions, and traps that test the limits of your sanity. Each decision you make brings you closer to freedom… or a fate worse than the shadows that lurk within.

With haunting visuals, an immersive soundtrack, and a gripping narrative, Nightmare Halls will keep you on edge as you navigate its eerie chambers. Are you brave enough to face its horrors and escape—or will you become another lost soul, forever trapped in its nightmare?
summary: A psychological horror game where you work through puzzles and walk through the halls of a mansion you are stuck in.
